description: Stoney HS Jacket Men. A ski jacket for outstanding comfort and with high elasticity thanks to MAMMUT® Dry Technology. Waterproof and breathable at the same time. The hood, specifically designed for snow, is helmet-compatible and can be detached when required. Easy to open, even when wearing gloves, thanks to the U-shaped zipper puller. With a wrist pocket for your ski pass and a roomy internal pocket for ski goggles.
name: Mammut Stoney HS Jacket - Mens
